INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Antilink
Now you can block any invite link or any other link that isn't send by a mod/admin
Report any bugs at https://github.com/Weirdo914/Weird-Cogs .
NAME: Antilink
SHORT: Automaticly remove Discord invite and other links from users
DESCRIPTION: Automaticly remove Discord invite links and other website links from users.
